Synopsis: Creates a data object from the items in a Metadata file (e.g. a .psd1)
Description: Serves as a wrapper for ConvertFrom-Metadata to explicitly support importing from files

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$data = Import-Metadata .\Configuration.psd1 -Ordered
Convert a module manifest into a hashtable of properties for introspection, preserving the order in the file
